name: Commonwealth v. Thompson et al., Appellants

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsex, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth v. Thompson et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of the Superior Court reported in 181 Pa. Superior Ct. 572, 124 A. 2d 180.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Edwin P. Lewis, appellant, in propria persona.
Robert H. Thompson, appellant, in propria persona.
Edward C. Boyle, District Attorney, and William Glaney Smith, Assistant District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Thompson et al., Appellants.
Submitted March 27, 1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsex, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
April 15, 1957:
Edwin P. Lewis, appellant, in propria persona.
Robert H. Thompson, appellant, in propria persona.
Edward C. Boyle, District Attorney, and William Glaney Smith, Assistant District Attorney, for appellee.
